reactor.bus

Class Event<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.bus.Event<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the wrapped object
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Recyclable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CallbackEvent, EventBus.ReplyToEvent

    public class Event<T>
extends Object
implements Serializable, Recyclable
    Wrapper for an object that needs to be processed by Consumers.
    Author:
    Jon Brisbin, Stephane Maldini, Andy Wilkinson
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
